definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Chandler wants Monica to wear the earings he gave her.
sentences.chinese: 錢德希望莫妮卡戴上他送的耳環。

sentences.english: He sported a pair of brass earrings.
sentences.chinese: 他的耳朵上戴着一副銅耳環。

sentences.english: These earrings remind me of grandma's earrings.
sentences.chinese: 這對耳環讓我想起了外婆的耳環。

sentences.english: These earrings remind me of grandma's earrings.
sentences.chinese: 這對耳環讓我想起了外婆的耳環。

sentences.english: So I like rings, scarfs and sunglasses.
sentences.chinese: 因此我喜歡耳環圍巾和太陽鏡。

sentences.english: Opt for stud earrings or single bracelets.
sentences.chinese: 選擇鑽石耳環或者單手鐲。

sentences.english: P18 2a, He should stop wearing that silly earring.
sentences.chinese: 他應該停止戴那個難看的耳環。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated pierced earrings with Jonquil crystal lemon and leaf in Peridot crystal.
sentences.chinese: 銠鍍穿耳環與信奉水晶檸檬葉在橄欖石晶體。

sentences.english: Dazzle her with these one of a kind sapphire and diamond earrings.
sentences.chinese: 這款精緻炫目的藍寶石鑽石耳環一定令她驚喜不已。

sentences.english: 19 the earrings and bracelets and veils
These hoop earrings are savvy and spunky and love to be worn frequently.
sentences.chinese: 這些箍耳環是精明的，有勇氣，喜歡佩戴頻繁。

sentences.english: She served her earring as a pin.
sentences.chinese: 她將她的耳環充當飾針。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated pierced earrings with bezel-set clear crystals in various cuts.
sentences.chinese: 鍍白金色穿孔耳環配以不同形狀的包邊鑲嵌透明水晶。

sentences.english: She had her ears pierced so that she could wear ear-rings.
sentences.chinese: 她已紮了耳朵眼好戴耳環。

sentences.english: The earrings, measuring just over a centimeter…
sentences.chinese: 這套耳環與項煉，真是美極了。

definition: outfit or suit (of clothes)/set of coordinated items/kit
